title: Lewis & Clark National Historic Trail: History & Culture
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture             History & Culture         Expedition reenactors at the Pacific Ocean.   The Lewis and Clark Expedition is more than the story of two men. It is the story of many: individuals and groups, military men and scientists, a president and a slave, women and men, French-speaking boatmen and American Indians. It is a story of loss and hope. It is a story of changes that began in 1803 and that continue today. Learn more about some of these stories by visiting People and Places.
